hackathon-description-text: Kent State's Aviation Hackathon, SkyHack, will consist of a one weekend competition for the $10,000 grand prize and $1,000 challenge stream prizes. Students will compete in teams, solving real industry problems. ​
hackathon-eligibility: All participants must be 18 or older and be a current Undergraduate or Graduate student.
hackathon-requirements: Your posting depends on your project and type. We suggest a combination of the following:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: sponsored by Kent State University Design Innovation Group

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: 2. Harassing Harvey, Irritating Irma, & Mocking Maria
4. How to Fix the Pilot Shortage
